hanzi-su-wiki:
導

Значения

Вести, направлять, руководить; путь, учение

Мнемоника

Вести за собой, рукой 寸 указывая путь 道.

Варианты

导

to transmit; to lead; to guide; to conduct; to direct
передавать; вести; руководить; проводить; направлять

heisig_chinese_memo: For guideance on the road-way, glue a GPS unit to your car.
heisig_constituent: guidance, neck, horns, drop, eye, road, glue
heisig_story: When we accept someone's guidance, we permit ourselves to be glued to a certain road or way of doing something, and try to "stick" to it.

jp_example_words:
主導(しゅどう): main leadership
導入(どうにゅう): introduction, bringing in, leading in
導く(みちびく): to be guided, to be shown
誘導(ゆうどう): guidance, leading, induction, introduction, incitement, inducement
指導(しどう): leadership, guidance, coaching
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Take a measurement of the road. Hmm. It seems a bit too long. As you measure it, you continue down this road, wondering where it will lead you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Roads are really long, so I imagine it would take a long time to measure it (if you want to go from end to end). Imagine yourself pulling a tape measure along with you, all the while thinking, "where will this lead me?"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Where does the road that you're measuring lead you? An awesome doughnut (どう) shop!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: What a perfect way to end this road measuring. You're hungry. Nom nom nom. Imagine eating your fill, and taste the donuts in your mouth. You just walked a long ways!
Ru_Radicals: 并, 込 (внутрь), 寸 (дюйм), 自 (сам)
Ru_trainchinese: dǎo: (глаг) инструктировать, давать указания; вести за собой; проводить (напр., ток); направлять, руководить
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an inch (寸) down the road (道) you need to be guided
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Telling the size of a snake by measuring its snakeskin requires a guide.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " inch " and " dao ", the original meaning is guidance. "Shuowen": "Guide Yin Ye. Cun Cun, Dao Sheng." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuzhong": "The enemy is the guest, Guan Yin tells you, the principle is to reverse the rule, and the waiting person is the guide." Wei Zhao's note: " Lead the guest to the DPRK."

" Guide " can mean persuade and induce. "Mo Zi‧ Fei Confucianism": "The Tao cannot be envisioned, and its learning cannot lead the public.

" Guide " can be extended to lure. "Huainanzi-Yaolue": "Qi Jinggong has a good reputation inside, but a good dog and horse outside... Liangqiu is guided by his family, so Yanzi's advice is born."

" Guide " also means development. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "The husband and the king will guide the profit and lay the top and the bottom, so that the gods and men are infinite." Wei Zhao's note: "Guide, open."

" Guide " also means dredging and dredging. "Shu‧Yugong": "Guide and Qi, as for Jingshan."

" Guide " also refers to water sources. In the Northern Wei Dynasty, Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Zhu-Huai Shui": "Huai water and Lishui are derived from the same source. The west flows to Li and the east flows to Huai."

" Guide " also refers to expression and communication. "Mandarin-Jin Language Sixth": "Fu Chengzi will lead the predecessor to Zuo Xianjun." Wei Zhao's note: "Dao, Da Ye."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " inch " and " dao ", the original meaning is guidance.
humanum_full_description:
從「寸」，「道」聲，本義為引導。《說文》：「導引也。从寸，道聲。」《國語‧周語中》：「敵國賓至，關尹以告，行理以節逆之，候人為導。」韋昭注：「導賓至於朝。」

　　「導」可表示勸導、誘導。《墨子‧非儒下》：「其道不可以期世，其學不可以導眾。」

　　「導」可引申為引誘。《淮南子‧要略》：「齊景公內好聲色，外好狗馬……梁丘據子家噲導於左右，故晏子之諫生焉。」

　　「導」也表示開發。《國語‧周語上》：「夫王人者，將導利而布之上下者也，使神人百物無不得其極。」韋昭注：「導，開也。」

　　「導」還表示疏浚、疏導。《書‧禹貢》：「導岍及岐，至於荊山。」

　　「導」還指水源。北魏酈道元《水經注‧淮水》：「淮水與醴水同源俱導，西流為醴，東流為淮。」

　　「導」還指表達、傳達。《國語‧晉語六》：「夫成子導前志以佐先君。」韋昭注：「導，達也。」

從「 寸 」，「 道 」聲，本義為引導。《說文》：「導引也。从寸，道聲。」《國語‧周語中》：「敵國賓至，關尹以告，行理以節逆之，候人為導。」韋昭注：「導賓至於朝。」 「 導 」可表示勸導、誘導。《墨子‧非儒下》：「其道不可以期世，其學不可以導眾。」 「 導 」可引申為引誘。《淮南子‧要略》：「齊景公內好聲色，外好狗馬……梁丘據子家噲導於左右，故晏子之諫生焉。」 「 導 」也表示開發。《國語‧周語上》：「夫王人者，將導利而布之上下者也，使神人百物無不得其極。」韋昭注：「導，開也。」 「 導 」還表示疏浚、疏導。《書‧禹貢》：「導岍及岐，至於荊山。」 「 導 」還指水源。北魏酈道元《水經注‧淮水》：「淮水與醴水同源俱導，西流為醴，東流為淮。」 「 導 」還指表達、傳達。《國語‧晉語六》：「夫成子導前志以佐先君。」韋昭注：「導，達也。」
From the sound of " inch" and " dao", the original meaning is guidance. "Shuowen": "Guide Yin Ye. Cun Cun, Dao Sheng." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuzhong": "The enemy is the guest, Guan Yin tells you, the principle is to reverse the rule, and the waiting person is the guide." Wei Zhao's note: " Lead the guest to the DPRK." " Guide" can mean persuade and induce. "Mo Zi‧ Fei Confucianism": "The Tao cannot be envisioned, and its learning cannot lead the public. " Guide" can be extended to lure. "Huainanzi-Yaolue": "Qi Jinggong has a good reputation inside, but a good dog and horse outside... Liangqiu is guided by his family, so Yanzi's advice is born." " Guide" also means development. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "The husband and the king will guide the profit and lay the top and the bottom, so that the gods and men are infinite." Wei Zhao's note: "Guide, open." " Guide" also means dredging and dredging. "Shu‧Yugong": "Guide and Qi, as for Jingshan." " Guide" also refers to water sources. In the Northern Wei Dynasty, Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Zhu-Huai Shui": "Huai water and Lishui are derived from the same source. The west flows to Li and the east flows to Huai." " Guide" also refers to expression and communication. "Mandarin-Jin Language Sixth": "Fu Chengzi will lead the predecessor to Zuo Xianjun." Wei Zhao's note: "Dao, Da Ye."

dǎo
вм. 导
Radicals: 道, 寸  (road, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
Take a measurement of the road. Hmm. It seems a bit too long. As you measure it, you continue down this road, wondering where it will lead you.
Roads are really long, so I imagine it would take a long time to measure it (if you want to go from end to end). Imagine yourself pulling a tape measure along with you, all the while thinking, "where will this lead me?"
Reading Mnemonic
Where does the road that you're measuring lead you? An awesome doughnut (どう) shop!
What a perfect way to end this road measuring. You're hungry. Nom nom nom. Imagine eating your fill, and taste the donuts in your mouth. You just walked a long ways!
